content:
alexcrichton opened issue #11631:

The p3_http_outbound_request_content_length has a few failing conditions and surprising behavior. This is going to be post-https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/11440 and I'm filing an issue to track this work.

rvolosatovs closed issue #11631:

The p3_http_outbound_request_content_length has a few failing conditions and surprising behavior. This is going to be post-https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/11440 and I'm filing an issue to track this work.
